__TOC__



This week's Hug Day will focus on '''update-manager'''! 

After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your name in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after '''rowbgcolor='''.  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.

=== Tools ===

For doing your work easier during the hug days remember to use the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuBugDay/Tools|hugday-tools]]</nowiki>.

=== 5-a-day-ing ===
During hug days you can also do <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/5-A-Day|5-A-Day]]</nowiki> for this one you can do the following in order to tag your work on the hug day:

* 5-a-day --add-tag hugday-20090205
* Add bugs to 5-a-day as usual
* And when done with hug day run: 5-a-day --remove-tag hugday-20090205

=== Stock Responses ===

<pre>
Thank you for taking the time to report this bug and helping to make Ubuntu better. Could you please add the log files from '/var/log/dist-upgrade/' to this bug report as separate attachments? Thanks in advance.
</pre>

For problem specific Stock Responses see: <nowiki>[[Bugs-Responses]]</nowiki>

=== Tags ===

Tagging bugs are also a good way to isolate reports, the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DebuggingUpdateManager|Update-Manager]]</nowiki> product currently use these following tags:

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <rowbgcolor="#FFEBBB"> '''Tag'''
| '''Use case'''
|-
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bugs?field.tag=hardy2intrepid|`hardy2intrepid`]]</nowiki>
| Bugs related to upgrades from Hardy Heron (8.04) to Intrepid Ibex (8.10)
|-
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bugs?field.tag=gutsy2hardy|`gutsy2hardy`]]</nowiki>
| Bugs related to upgrading from Gutsy Gibbon (7.10) to Hardy Heron (8.04)
|-
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bugs?field.tag=feisty2gutsy|`feisty2gutsy`]]</nowiki>
| Bugs related to upgrading from Feisty Fawn (7.04) to Gutsy Gibbon (7.10)
|-
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bugs?field.tag=edgy2feisty|`edgy2feisty`]]</nowiki>
| Bugs related to upgrading from Edgy Eft (6.10) to Feisty Fawn (7.04)
|-
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bugs?field.tag=dapper2hardy|`dapper2hardy`]]</nowiki>
| Bugs related to upgrades from Dapper Drake (6.06) to Hardy Heron (8.04)
|-
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bugs?field.tag=cdrom-upgrade|`cdrom-upgrade`]]</nowiki>
| Bugs related to an upgrade from CD-ROM or DVD media
|}

If you find a report which match any of those Use cases please add the tag to it.
